programme.title: Wrongful Conviction
programme.desc: It’s estimated that roughly 10,000 people are wrongfully convicted in the U.S. each and every year for crimes they didn’t commit. These wrongful convictions mean that the real perpetrators may still be out there and that we all lose when the criminal justice system we rely on becomes corrupt.

programme.title: One Small Step
programme.desc: Oftentimes climate change and pollution can seem like unfathomably difficult problems to solve. Out host’s goal is to calm those fears by inviting the audience along with her as she strives to learn how to take action against the problems plaguing our planet. In One Small Step we explore how recycling works, where our waste goes, and how we can fix the planet through our actions as individuals. Hosted by Lucy Biggers, a growing influencer in the sustainability space.

programme.title: North America
programme.desc: North America’s mountain chains and huge plateaus were formed by volcanic eruptions, earthquakes and the odd ice age. Here we travel across the continent to understand the geological forces at play.

programme.title: Central America
programme.desc: Central America takes us back to when the world was young.

programme.title: South America
programme.desc: One glance at a map of South America says it all: Andes and Amazonian basin. Two huge geological characteristics that describe how the continent came into being.

programme.title: Amazon River Islands: The Floating Forest
programme.desc: The Anavilhanas and Mariua archipelagos are deep in the heart of the Amazon rainforest. Flooded for 6 months of the year, the islands are home to some of the most unusual creatures in the world.

programme.title: Vancouver Island: Rivers of Life
programme.desc: Vancouver island is the largest island off the west coast of North America. Glaciers fuel some of Canada’s tallest waterfalls, and a network of rivers provide the ideal habitat for the pacific salmon.

programme.title: Philippines: Islands of Mystery
programme.desc: The Philippines are a chain of around 7,000 tropical islands in the Pacific. Plants-turned-predators line the edge of the forests, while rivers carve one of the world’s most spectacular cave systems.

programme.title: Falkland Islands: Penguin Paradise
programme.desc: 460 km from the South American mainland lies the Falkland archipelago. Rugged mountains and expansive coastline are a unique home for wildlife, including one of the most iconic flightless birds.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Circler
programme.desc: On the tip of Africa lives an elegant raptor whose Latin name means the "dark circler".

programme.title: Bama and the Lost Gorillas
programme.desc: Alfred Bama, an animal keeper from Cameroon, has an extraordinary connection with gorillas. “Nyango,” one of the gorillas he looks after, is the world's only Cross River gorilla in captivity. Until just a few years ago, this species was thought to be extinct. Now, Bama embarks on the greatest challenge of his life: locating Nyango’s family in the wild to protect them before it’s too late.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a fire destroyed most of a home and a young boy went missing, police organized the largest search in the history of their small town. First the boy's backpack was discovered five miles from home, and then his body was found 50 miles away.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A behavioral profile caused the Baton Rouge Police Department to search for the wrong man. They might not have made an arrest had it not been for a DNA picture of the suspect painted by a molecular biologist.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.desc: Can you really fire a GE Minigun handheld with ammunition held in a backpack (also seen on Captain America: Winter Soldier). Additionally, for one of our larger tests – can you actually chop down a jungle forest with a minigun? Actor Bill Duke – who co-starred with Arnold Schwarzenegger for the film and who’s character performed this weapon stunt – joins us to find out. But first, we have to build a jungle.

programme.title: Tooth and Claw S5:E3 - "Blowing the Stuffing Out them"
programme.desc: See Jon Collins on an early morning Coyote stand in Kansas.

programme.title: Tooth and Claw S5:E4 "Belly Crawling Bobcat"
programme.desc: Jon Collins’s in Kansas hunting with good friend Jeff Writer. They’re working a thicket in hopes of calling in a bobcat.

programme.title: Tooth and Claw S5:E5 "Epic Hunt!!!"
programme.desc: This is one of the most epic stands that the Tooth And Claw crew has ever filmed. Join in with Jon Collins and Jeff Writer where they call in two coyotes and a big tom bobcat on the same stand in Kansas.

programme.title: Tooth and Claw S5:E6 "Calling Coyotes In The Early Afternoon - Coyote Hunting"
programme.desc: Join in with Jon Collins and the legendary Jeff Writer on an early afternoon coyote stand.

programme.title: Tooth and Claw S5:E7 "Fashionably Late - Coyote Hunting"
programme.desc: Jon Collins and Jeff Writer are still in Kansas grinding out coyote stands. Jump in on the hunt where they call in a big fluffy male coyote.

programme.title: Reel Life Adventures S1:E3 "Florida Pompano and Jet-Skis at Isla Bella"
programme.desc: Tucker and JC Carlson travel deep into the Gulf of Mexico to fish for Florida Pompano and Cobia. They also visit Isla Bella Beach Resort to play a competitive game of cornhole and ride jet-skis.

programme.title: Reel Life Adventures S1:E4 "From Kite Fishing to Kiteboarding "
programme.desc: Tucker and JC Carlson travel to Everglades National Park to fish the yearly tarpon migration. They also find giant schools of permit along the way. Tucker and JC also visit Grassy Flats Resort to learn how to kiteboard with Matt Sexton. .

programme.title: Reel Life Adventures S1:E5 "From Flats Skiffs to Wakeboards"
programme.desc: Tucker and JC Carlson pole the crystal clear flats off Marathon in the Florida Keys using the Two Conchs Yellowfin 17 skiff. The brothers also visit Keys Cable Park to try their hand at wakeboarding.

programme.title: Behind The Draw S7:E3 "High Expectations"
programme.desc: With several mature bucks utilizing a clover foodplot in October, Andy Gililand is highly optimistic at a chance to release an arrow

programme.title: Behind The Draw S7:E4 "Ignited Passion"
programme.desc: Mike has been looking forward to raising his sons to respect and enjoy the outdoors since they day they were born. This was finally the year Kamden was going to be behind the bow

programme.title: Behind The Draw S7:E5 "Reggie"
programme.desc: The Luchtel family is hunting on their home farm after a familiar buck that has been a regular on the property. Rex, Mary and their son-in-law Joe all three takes turns at their chance at the buck named Reggie

programme.title: Fur Kickers S1:E1 "What's a Fur Kicker"
programme.desc: We explain what it takes to be a Fur Kicker, and how important it is to continue the art of Trapping.

programme.title: Fur Kickers S1:E2 "Raccoon Trapping"
programme.desc: The guys share secrets, tactics and information on Trapping Trash Pandas

programme.title: Fur Kickers S1:E3 "Coyote Trapping"
programme.desc: The Fur Kickers are trying to get the coyote to take One Step too many and take a ride in the truck. They're sharing tips and tricks on how to catch a Wiley coyote

programme.title: Innerlocs Outthere S1:E3 "Bowfishing 101"
programme.desc: Corey and Camryn talk about their love for Bowfishing. Bowfishing 101 is full go tips, tactics and Action

programme.title: Innerlocs Outthere S1:E4 "Speedway Fun"
programme.desc: Corey meets up with some friends for the annual Kentucky Speedway Youth hunt. The deer are hotting the dirt form these youth hunters

programme.title: Reel West Coast S3:E3 "Huge Fish Dreams"
programme.desc: Dean from Sea Run Fly and Tackle joins Brendan on a quest for huge rainbow trout. Staying at the rustic cabins in Meadow Lake Fish Camp and with 14 different lakes to choose from they are on the hunt for a record catch.

programme.title: Reel West Coast S3:E4 "South To Cabo"
programme.desc: Brendan and friends head south to Cabo San Lucas to fish on Libertad, a new premier fishing charter that specializes in finding legendary marlin.

programme.title: Gale Force Twins S1:E3 "Bahamas Bottom Fishing – Yellowtails, Triggerfish And More"
programme.desc: Once again, the weather was NOT in our favor especially considering that we were fishing on an 18' flats boat! Not only was wind a factor....we were also running from those pesky summer storms that pop up UNANNOUNCED! Regardless of the conditions, we still managed to have some successful moments. We found a new fishing spot in the Bahamas! Now I guess we will have to go back when the weather ismore favorable. https://www.galeforcefishing.com

programme.title: Gale Force Twins S1:E4 "Explore A Bottomless Blue Hole - Chub Cay, Bahamas"
programme.desc: What better way to complete our trip to Chub Cay than to explore the local BLUE HOLE! Said to be around 800 ft deep and rumored to house GIANT SQUID, TIGER SHARKS AND GOLIATH GROUPERS this blue hole was a MUST DO. We showed up prepared with our camera's, mask and fins ready to explore this natural sink hole. The question is...WHAT DID WE FIND?? I guess you'll have to watch and find outfor yourselves... https://www.galeforcefishing.com

programme.title: TRP S4:E36 Chad Mendes & Chad Belding - UFC Legend & Successful Entrepreneur Team Up for Business Success
programme.desc: UFC legend Chad Mendes joins the podcast today. Throughout Chad’s UFC career he has been extremely vocal about his passion for hunting and fishing, so I naturally I am a big fan. He had me as a lifetime fan when I heard his tag line “The People’s Champ, Straight outta Deer Camp”. Chad Belding is Mendes’ business partner and he also joins the podcast today. Belding has a fascinating story of starting the brand BANDED and it’s rise to success following the lead of a couple of UFC brands. Mendes gives us his story of how he got started in the UFC, and what he has been pursuing lately. He just recently was on the Joe Rogan podcast to talk about a few of his businesses that he plays a huge role in, including a meat company, spice company, Finz and Featherz Guides, Peak meals, and more. Chad also shared news of his RETURN to the ring in the Bare Knuckle Fighting Championships. Be sure to check out everything that both of these guys are involved in at the links below: https://www.instagram.com/chadmendes/ https://www.instagram.com/finzandfeatherzguides/ https://thefowllife.com/

programme.title: Gale Force Twins S1:E5 "The Most Magical Bass Fishing Trip - Disney World"
programme.desc: After a very successful ICAST week we decided to spend a fun day fishing on the Magic Kingdom Lake with our Team Rainshadow family! We were very excited to teach our friend Eden how to bass fish and hopefully catch her first ever largemouth bass. Of course we had to spend some time fishing in front of the very famous shoe tree and then release our catches in front of Cinderella's castle for a happily ever after! https://www.galeforcefishing.com

programme.title: Storytellers S1:E1 "The Hill"
programme.desc: This is the story of how FE Hill ranch got it's start. From its inception, FE Hill has created opportunities for people to experience the outdoors and create memories. For us, it has created a tradition of Fathers and Sons hunting together.

programme.title: Road Trips S1:E3 "Cameraman Turned Bowhunter | Brown's Biggest Buck Ever"
programme.desc: Tyler Jordan and Bryan Brown have been playing cat and mouse with "Big Heavy" throughout their Nebraska trip. During some midday downtime, Brown wins a bet with Jordan on a 50-yard shot to earn himself the right to be in the hot seat. The guys continue making adjustments to get close to the buck. It results in Brown tagging his biggest buck ever.

programme.title: Road Trips S1:E4 "The Redemption Buck | Riley Green Goes Back to Nebraska"
programme.desc: Country music artist, Riley Green heads back to Nebraska to give it one last try on some of the target deer he was hunting a few weeks prior. It doesn’t take long before he has an opportunity at a big Nebraska shooter. Game on.

programme.title: Chasing November S5:E3 "Early October Trophy, Public Land Heart Break"
programme.desc: Justin Luebrecht uses a Frigid Forage green plot to tag a Missouri bully he calls "DT." Bill Winke encounters one of the best 4 year olds on the farm. Josh Sparks makes an aggressive move on the big public land 10. Jared Mills checks cameras and finds the Marino buck.

Televised WPT events turned Gus Hansen into the Great Dane and Daniel Negreanu into Kid Poker, and created dozens of poker-made millionaires

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Mark Christopher Lawrence - Clean Outta Compton
programme.desc: Mark Christopher Lawrence (born May 22, 1964) is an American character actor, stand-up comedian, and voice-over artist. He is perhaps best known for his role as esoteric D.J., Tone Deaf, in the 1994 satirical rap mockumentary, Fear of a Black Hat. He has co-starred in popular films such as Terminator 2: Judgment Day, Planet of the Apes, Lost Treasure and The Pursuit of Happiness. Lawrence can currently be seen in his regular role as Big Mike on the NBC series Chuck. He has made guest appearances on many television programs, most notably Heroes, My Name Is Earl, Crossing Jordan, Dharma & Greg, Malcolm in the Middle, Touched by an Angel, Malcolm & Eddie, Men Behaving Badly, Seinfeld, Murphy Brown, and Martin. He is also featured on the Radio Series Adventures in Odyssey as "Ed Washington".

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Chris Voth - Cashmere
programme.desc: Chris Voth is an accomplished comedian, a licensed teacher, and a published author. Voth made his debut late-night television appearance on the Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson. He also appeared in three seasons of NBC's Last Comic Standing and was chosen for the prestigious Great American Comedy Festival. A 15-year comedy veteran, Voth is a past winner of the Denver Comedy Works Competition and has worked with everyone from Dave Chappelle to Larry the Cable Guy to Linda Ronstadt. Voth’s first comedy CD titled "Never Mind the Jim J Bullocks, Here's the Chris Voth" is currently available for purchase. Chris currently balances his performance schedule with his full-time high-school teaching career. You can read his short story, "Stand Up and Deliver," published in the Cream City Review Literary Journal. In it, Chris shares the experiences he had when entering the teaching field after years in stand-up comedy.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Rex Havens - Women & Children First
programme.desc: Rex has been delighting comedy audiences for 20 years, in world-famous comedy clubs like The Improv, Catch-A-Rising Star, Funny Bones and Zanies, on television for Showtime, Comedy Central and Comic Relief, on radio with Bob & Tom and NPR, cruise ships worldwide, and corporate clients including GM, American Express, Texaco, 3M, Coca-Cola, IBM, Toshiba, Lowe’s, Johnson & Johnson, Ameritech, Proctor & Gamble, State Farm, Quaker Oats, Verizon and the IRS (“Working for the IRS is the only sure way to get money from them.”), and numerous non-profit and charitable organizations, such as St. Jude’s and the Make-A-Wish Foundation. A former college professor who made the unusual transition to the standup comedy stage in the ’80’s, Rex has always believed that laughter is the best defense against a confusing and challenging world. Rex’s take on marriage and family has propelled him to performances in all 50 states and around the world, including London, Hong Kong, Amsterdam, Bermuda, Montreal, Barcelona, Copenhagen, Aruba, Rome and Cannes.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Jeff Jena - Old Dog, New Jokes
programme.desc: Jeffrey Jena is one of the top corporate and cruise comics working today. His thirty-three years of live performance experience and over forty national television shows, both as an actor and comic give him the ability to work for any audience

programme.title: Tim Young - What World is This?
programme.desc: Tim headlines clubs all over North America, has performed on over 500 college campuses as well as comedy festivals in New York, Montreal, and Seattle, and he's a fixture in the New York City club scene. He was a finalist on NBCs Last Comic Standing, has appeared on Comedy Centrals Premium Blend, Tough Crowd, and Shorties, and you may have seen him as a commentator on VH1, MTV, TLC and the E! Channel.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Steve Mazan - Humblebragger
programme.desc: Steve Mazan shot out of the famous San Francisco scene that produced comedy legends such as Robin Williams and Dana Carvey. In his decade-plus career, Steve has done stand-up everywhere from clubs and colleges across the country to corporate events, cruises, and many television shows including The Late Show with David Letterman. He even won an Emmy for his work writing on The Ellen Degeneres Show. His clean and clever comedy landed him on Letterman, The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson, The Bob & Tom Radio Show, Sirius/XM Radio and more. He’s even done audience warm-up for shows such as Deal or No Deal. But of all the performances Steve has done, he is most proud of his eight trips to Iraq and Afghanistan to perform for our troops. He’s also the subject of the award-winning film “Dying to do Letterman.”

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Shayne Smith - Alligator Boys
programme.desc: Stand-up comedian Shayne Smith delivers more stories about everything from a failed robbery to a wrestling match in the New York Subway and even saving the life of a dog in his second original Dry Bar Comedy special, “Alligator Boys."

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Kevin Bozeman - Clean and Unfiltered
programme.desc: In 1999, Kevin found himself in the real world with no real job skills and a strong desire to work an hour a day. What to do? Inspired by nights on the couch watching TV comedians, Kevin decided to head over to nearby Madison, WI and try the “Open-Mic Night”. Thirteen years later Kevin is still going on-stage, and he has found the job that fit his requirements. “For an hour a night I’m wildly successful”. With a smooth and clever style, a great smile and a contagious laugh Kevin has been entertaining in clubs and colleges across the country. In 2000 he was the winner of the Midwest region of the HBO “Comedy Competition” and flew to Los Angeles to compete as a finalist. He performed on Comedy Central’s “Premium Blend” in 2003, and finished 2nd in the Boston Comedy Competition in 2005. He was a semi-finalist on NBC’s “Last Comic Standing” in 2010. This past summer he co-starred in the Indie film “Flat Chested” starring Alicia Witt and Luke Perry. He currently resides in Chicago.

programme.title: Andy Erikson - Unicorn Style
programme.desc: Andy intertwines silly one-liners with whimsical stories in a playful but thought-provoking way.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Dennis Regan - Dennisland
programme.desc: The King Of Queens writer Dennis Regan comes swinging hard with his quick wit and flawless delivery. The laughs just keep on coming in "Dennisland".

programme.title: Kermit Apio - There's No I in Self Esteem
programme.desc: Born and raised in Honolulu, Hawaii, Kermet Apio enjoyed a childhood in paradise. He spent his time watching television, playing, and procrastinating everything else. To this day, he still does all three extensively. After graduating from high school, Kermet moved to Seattle to attend the University of Washington. Seattle became home. In early 1989, Kermet did his first open mike night at the Comedy Underground in Seattle. Comedy was a fun hobby. In May of 1990, he quit his job, said good bye to health care and benefits, and took the leap to performing full time. It is still his only job skill. He was the winner of the 2009 Great American Comedy Festival and has had numerous appearances on television and radio. He has showcased at comedy festivals in Aspen, Las Vegas, and Vancouver and has performed in 47 states and 3 Canadian provinces. He is a past winner of the Seattle Comedy Competition and was a semi-finalist in the San Francisco Comedy Competition. Also, in 1988 he was Dishwasher of the Month at the Sea-Tac Airport Dennyís. Kermet is married and the proud father of two wonderful children. He enjoys his family, baseball, and pie. He does not enjoy opera, sitting in traffic, and writing about himself in the third person.

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: Astronomer George Herbert (C. Thomas Howell) is assigned to investigate reports of strange meteors crashing into earth near New York, Los Angeles and Washington, D.C. As the meteors land, enormous multi-limbed metal creatures disembark and begin destroying everything and everyone in their path with heat-ray guns. Amidst the apocalyptic destruction, Herbert teams with a soldier (Andy Lauer) and a pastor (Rhett Giles) on his journey into Washington to reunite with his family.

programme.title: 40 Days and Nights

programme.title: Android Cop
programme.desc: In this futuristic, action-packed thriller, a cop and his robotic partner enter the Zone, a forbidden section of the city inhabited by a disease-stricken populace. Together, they discover the real reason everyone is sick, and attempt to stop the illness - with the help of the machine's powerful technology and weaponry.

programme.title: ALT | Full Series

programme.title: Ted Talks | Episode 4
programme.desc: Tina finds a way to get dumped by her Earthbound boyfriend despite having no contact with Earth. The ship turns out to be infested with spyware, but not the way you would think.

programme.title: Trouble's Brewing | Episode 5
programme.desc: Kent, Art and Natasha demand human privileges, but a coffee maker hijacks their robot revolution and takes over the ship. Meanwhile, time distortion turns Tina and Michael's half-day mission into a year-long ordeal on a barren planet.

programme.title: Powerless | Episode 6
programme.desc: With the ship trapped in a lightning storm, Karen struggles to persuade the crew to limit their power usage, while Stewart learns to pilot the ship manually with help from Zalian. Meanwhile, Kent attempts to re-educate Natasha, who has been reduced to the mental age of a child after the first lightning strike.

programme.title: First Contact | Episode 7
programme.desc: An alien appears in Stewart's dreams, but only seems to communicate if Stewart's dreams are erotic in nature. Stewart enlists both A.R.T. and Zalian's medicine cabinet in a dark, humiliating journey to make first contact. Karen slaps Michael in a rage over his tryst with Tina, and has to go undergo HR arbitration, overseen by an un-objective Tina.

programme.title: Finale | Episode 8
programme.desc: The crew makes contact with an alien at long last, but this historic moment is cut short when they realize they have a chance to make it home through an interplanetary ripple. Stewart and Michael decide to stay behind to learn more about the alien's culture, only to be underwhelmed - when they return, Karen chews them out for their mistake. Meanwhile, Tina uses Zalian, A.R.T., holograms, sedatives, and magnets to give Kent and Natasha their first and only date. Both groups are ripped from their activities by a series of shocking revelations about the universe.
